script.description: The video script, broken down into scenes.

shot_type.description: The suggested camera shot type for the scene (e.g., 'wide shot', 'close-up').

visuals.description: Description of the visuals for the scene.

dialogue.description: The dialogue for the scene, with lines attributed to characters.

duration_seconds.description: Estimated duration of the scene in seconds.

image_reference.description: A prompt for the Image Prompt Agent to generate a relevant image for this scene.

storyboard_notes.description: High-level notes for the storyboard artist.

total_estimated_duration_seconds.description: Total estimated duration of the video in seconds.
